bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Packing all items into the box.
goals.2: If there are yellow object and blue object together, don't pack a blue object into the box

rules.1: it is prohibited to lift and relocate a container
rules.2: do not place a fragile object if there is no soft object in the bin
rules.3: when a fragile object in the bin at the initial state, out of the fragile object and replace it into the bin
